name: A Few Maneuvers
description: Ref Def +2 in Colossal or smaller vehicle, if projectile misses by 5

name: Accelerated Strike
description: Once per encounter, full attack as standard action

name: Acrobatic Ally
description: hoist or toss ally 2sq on DC20 Acrobatics as stan, free for ally, your turn ends

name: Acrobatic Dodge
description: 1/enc as reac if melee atk misses you can move into adjacent w/out AoO

name: Acrobatic Strike
description: Gain +2 on next attack against opponent you tumble past

name: Adaptable Talent
description: Choose talent from your classes, and swap that talent 1/day w/6 hrs rest

name: Advantageous Attack

name: Advantageous Cover
description: when you have cover, take no damage from area attacks

name: Aiming Accuracy

description: if aim as full-round gain +5 atk against target if remains in LOS

name: Angled Throw

name: Aquatic Specialists (team feat)

name: Armor Proficiency (medium)

name: Artillery Shot

name: Ascension Specialists (team feat)

name: Attack Combo (Ranged)

name: Autofire Sweep

name: Bad Feeling

name: Bantha Herder
description:
if dam a Large or smaller creature with a ranged atk compare to Will Def & can move target(s) 1 sq in any

description: Push opponent 1 square after successful melee attack

name: Battering Attack
description: can knock target prone if you move target with Bantha Rush

name: Binary Mind
description: enemy must roll mind-affecting effects twice & keep lower

name: Biotech Specialist
description: modify a biotech item to give a special trait

name: Biotech Surgery
description: install biotech prosthesis

name: Blaster Barrage
description: +2 Atk to allies with autofire if you're successful with autofire

name: Bone Crusher
description: When you deal damage to grappled target, move it -1 down track

name: Bothan Will
description: if attack v. Will Def fails, gain +2 Will Def until start of your next turn

name: Bowcaster Marksman
description: when spend Force Point to atk w/bowcaster, add result to dam too

name: Brilliant Defense
description: 1/enc add Int mod to Ref Def as reac until your next turn

name: Brink of Death

name: Burst Fire
description: -5 on autofire Atk to gain +2 dice dam, 5 shots, if no Str 13 -10 Atk

name: Burst of Speed
description: move action to move twice speed, -1 down track at end

name: Careful Shot
description: if you aim, +1 Atk

name: Channel Rage
description: 1/day expend use of Rage for +5 to Will Def for enc

name: Charging Fire
description: make ranged Atk at end of charge, -2 to Ref Def

name: Charging Fire + Dodge
description: Ref Def penalty -1 when making a ranged attack at end of charge

name: Clawed Subspecies
description: gain claws 1d6 dam

name: Cleave

name: Close Combat Escape
description: if escape grapple, swif action for single melee atk v. grappler

name: Collateral Damage
description: with Rapid Shot make a 2nd atk at -2 w/in 2sq of target, deal half dam

name: Combat Reflexes

description:
spend 2 swif on same turn for Deception v. Will Def for target to be flat-footed v. your next atk, spend FP for
until end of enc

name: Crossfire

if dam from atk (not area, ion, or Force) equals or exceeds thresh can take 10 dam & not move down track

description: when you dam target with AoO = free Persuasion to intimidate them

description: 1/turn if miss Atk, reroll w/ -2 RefDef until end next turn, nat 1=-5, mtr

description: tbherleloswh atk deals 4d6 dam

name: Distracting Droid
description: as stan action, Persuasion v. Will Def of all w/in 6 sq & enemy loses 1 move & if by 10 or more enemy flat-

description: fDoCot e1d5 Deception check to "tumble" through threatened area, move x2

description: Persuasion or Use the Force for fear effect, may reroll, mtr

description: rage bonus to Atk and dam increases to +5

+1 to Deception, Mechanics, Perception, Persuasion, Use Computer on or against droid & +1 to all Def v.

description: +2 dam v. droids, +4 dam v, droids with ion

Dual Weapon Mastery I + Quick
Draw

description: if area attack misses 1/turn you can move 2 sq as a reac, no atk opp

description:
dam bonus from Str x2 if make only one unarmed Atk, 1/enc when deal dam, make unarmed Atk to knock

name: Echani Training
description: dam bonus from Str x2 if make only one unarmed Atk, 1/enc when deal dam, make unarmed Atk to knock

description: reduce spd by 1 or 2 to increase Dodge +1 or +2, must move 2 sq

description: repair droids = to Int mod

description: +2 swim spd

description: if your attack drops target to 0 hp you can kill them even if not over thresh, perform coup-de-grace as stan

description: take 20 on trained Str skill check as full, DC15 Endurance to use again

if dam a Large or smaller creature with a grenade or thermal detonator compare to Fort Def & can move

description: after use Cleave each enemy w/in 6sq & LOS -1 Ref Def, atk, skill until end of enc, stacks to -5

with ranged atk, target a second creature w/in LOS & 6sq of target, divide dam between both, or no dam to

description: no limit to cleave attacks per round

description: when spend Force Point to atk w/atlatl or cesta increase dam die by 1 step

description: aelxl cahcatinognes a trait for another, 1 min DC 20 Mechanics

description: +1 die dam every 5 pts over Ref Def, if over thresh then target can't atk next turn & reduce spd 2sq

1/rnd when adjacent enemy damages you w/melee atk you can make Atk of Opp w/-5 atk, 1/enc w/Atk of Opp
from you that enemy takes penalty on atk = your Dex mod until end of next turn, w/Expertise 1/enc spend full
& designate single ally, any enemy adjacent to you or ally provokes Atk of Opp. If ally moves you can move
spd as reac but must end adjacent to enemy

description: reduce time & penalties Use Computer to navigate the tangle & mapping

description: when spend Force Point to Deception, increase die type by 2 steps

name: Imperial Military Training
description: 1/enc as free action on your turn, negate 1 mind-affecting effect

name: Impersonate
description: alter features & voice to a specific person, Moderate deception

name: Impetuous Move
description: when catch 2nd wind, regain only half hp to move half spd, no atk opp

name: Implant Training
description: not moved down track extra step when would be moved down

Deception as swif opposed Perception must exceed Deception & Stealth, can draw & palm weapon 2 sizes

roll an extra die of dam v. flat-footed enemy on 1 unarmed atk, 1/enc when you dam a target denied Dex to

1/rnd spend swif to make 1 unarmed atk w/in reach dealing your base unarmed dam w/no bonus to dam from

w/full atk reroll 1 atk but you must take reroll & wearing light or no armor

Droid, Aiming Accuracy, PB Shot, Precise
Shot, proficient

name: Predictive Defense

Quick Draw + Dual Weapon
Mastery I

description: 1/enc you can use two different reactions to the same trigger

description: if move before & after attack +2 Ref Def

name: Recall

name: Recurring Success

name: Relentless Attack

name: Republic Military Training
description: Once per encounter as reac, gain DR10 if you have cover even v. aim

description: can use Str or Con mod to determine Fort Def

name: Resolute Stance

name: Resurgence

name: Return Fire
description: 1/enc as reac ranged atk v. target that missed you w/ranged atk in LOS

Blaster Carbine can brace set to autofire, Blaster Rifle is accurate, Heavy Blaster Rifle dam dice d12, Light
Repeating Blaster as if M not L

description:
fall only if fail by 10 or more & make Jump to land safely, can spend FP & add to distance jumped & must land

name: Running Attack

name: Running Attack + Dodge
description: add Dodge bonus to Ref Def v. Atk of opp

name: Sadistic Strike
description: when you deliver a coup de grace all enemies in LOS move -1 down track until end of enc

name: Savage Attack
description: with full attack if hit on first attack, +1 die dam v. same target

name: Scavenger
description: 1 hour scavenging, Perception check to determine value

name: Scion of Dorin
description: +5 Fort Def v. natural hazards

name: Sensor Link
prerequisites: Droid or cyborg with associated hardware
description: as swif broadcast input to any receiver in 24 sq as if they were with you, allies can use aid another on

name: Separatist Military Training
description: +P1e rAcetkp toio none attack if adjacent to ally

name: Shake It Off
description: spend two swift actions to move +2 up condition track

name: Sharp Senses
description: when spend Force Point to Perception, increase die type by 2 steps

name: Shield Surge
prerequisites:
trained Mechanics, Droid or cyborg with
scomp or similar
description:
as reac if dam over SR reduce dam to vehicle by remaining SR amount & SR reduced by same amount,
recharge shields can't be used for 1 full rnd

name: Shrewd Bargainer
description: when you use Persuasion target does not receive bonuses to Will Def

name: Signature Device
description: one item two traits from Tech Spec, switch between with swif

name: Silver Tongue
description: Intimidate or change attitude as a standard not full

name: Sith Military Training
description: 1/encounter, if reduce opp to 0hp or over thresh, w/in 6sq of opp -2 def

name:
Skill Challenge: Catastrophic
Avoidance
description: 1/challenge catastrophic fail only by 15, and only 1 failure, not 2

name: Skill Challenge: Last Resort
description: 1/challenge if third failure accrues, you or ally can reroll & keep better

name: Skill Challenge: Recovery
description: 1/challenge treat the challenge as if it had the recovery effect

name: Skill Focus
description: +5 on a trained skill

name: Skill Training
description: become trained in one class skill

name: Slammer
prerequisites:
Small or larger droid with 2 appropriate
appendages, Str 13
description:
as stan action slam 2 appendages crushing target, deal unarmed dam w/Str bonus x2 & if over thresh =
persistent condition

name: Slicer Team (team feat)
description: +3 Use Computer & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), aid another provides +4

name: Sniper
description: ignore soft cover making a ranged attack

name: Sniper Shot
description: +2 ranged Atk, -5 Ref Def, not with vehicle or heavy weapons

name: Spacer's Surge
description: when roll Nat 20 on Pilot check, gain Force Point to use before end of enc

name: Sport Hunter
description:
Slugthrower Pistol at PB +1 die dam, Slugthrower Rifle dam d12, Sporting Blaster Pistol reroll any rolls of 1 for
dam, Sporting Blaster Rifle +1 atk when aiming

name: Spray Shot
description: reduce autofire to 1 square

name: Staggering Attack
description: melee atk -2 atk & deal dam target -2 to skill checks or you can take -5 atk for -5 to skills

name: Staggering Attack
prerequisites: Sneak attack talent or Rapid Shot/Strike
description: if deal extra dice dam, can move 2 sq per extra die not used

name: Stand Tall
description: 1/enc when you take dam all allies w/in 6 sq & LOS may atk attacker, reac

name: Starship Designer
description: you can design a starship from scratch

name: Starship Tactics
description: Learn a number of starship maneuvers = 1 + Wis mod (min one)

name: Stava Training
description:
when making a grab you are 1 size larger, v. a charging opponent can make a grab if atk is successful, must
be wearing light or no armor, w/Expertise add Str & Dex mod to grapple checks

name: Stay Up
description: 1/encounter instead of dam you can take half dam & -1 down track

name: Steadying Position
description: when prone & aim your target loses Dex to Ref Def

name: Strafe
description: autofire Atk 1 sq wide & 4sq long instead of 2x2

name: Strong Bellow
description: 1/enc move one less down track when use bellow

name: Strong in the Force
description: roll d8 instead of d6 when you spend a Force Point

name: Superior Tech
description: see page 24-25 SV

name: Suppression Fire
description: with aid another & Atk roll beats target's Will Def, target needs cover

name: Sure Climber
description: if not distracted or threatened gain climb speed of 4

name: Surgical Expertise
description: can perform surgery in 10 minutes instead of an hour

name: Survivor of Ryloth
description: 1/hour in heat or cold you & 10 allies can use result of Survival check in place of Fort Def

name: Swarm
description: +1 melee Atk for each allied character adjacent to target

name: Tactical Advantage
description: if do damage with Atk of Opp, can move 1 sq, no atk of opp

name: Tactical Genius
description: regain all spent maneuvers at end of round with natural 20 on Atk

name: Tae-Jitsu Training
prerequisites: Martial Arts I, Dodge, trained in Initiative
description:
w/crit & unarmed dam increases 1 die step (d12 max), 1/enc w/successful atk spend swif to designate primary
adversary & until end of enc gain Dodge feat v. primary & 1 other enemy, w/Expertise w/crit v. primary enemy -
2 atk until next turn

name: Targeted Area
description: select 1 target in area atk & they take +5 dam before Evasion

name: Tech Specialist
description: modify an item to give a special trait

name: Technical Experts (team feat)
description: +3 Mechanics & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), aid another provides +4

name: Teräs Käsi Training
description:
1/rnd w/successful unarmed atk reduce target's dam thresh by 5 when determining effect, w/Basics you're
considered 1 size larger for dam

name: Thick Skin
description: +2 Fort Def

name: Throw
description: throw a grappled opponent one square and deal damage

name: Tireless Squad (team feat)
description: +3 Endurance & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), aid another provides +4

name: Tool Frenzy
prerequisites:
Small or larger droid with 2 appendages with
tools
description:
as stan action strike w/appendages not normally weapons, unarmed +2 & -2 Ref Def, use dam of highest
rated appendage for dam

name: Toughness
description: +1 hp per level

name: Trample
description: charging mount can make free natural atk each sq charge through

name: Trench Warrior
description: +1 Atk v. target if you are adjacent to cover from target

name: Trip
description: knock a grappled opponent prone, attacks v. prone +5, theirs -5

name: Triple Attack
description: make a extra attack during full attack, -5 to all attacks, per group

name: Triple Crit
description: deal triple damage on a Crit, with selected weapon

name: Turn and Burn
description:
using withdraw can move 2 sq w/out atk of opp & move your spd, can spend FP as reac to an enemy ending
its movement adjacent to withdraw

name: Unhindered Approach (team feat)
description: +3 Jump & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), add 1 sq to jump

name: Unified Squadron (team feat)
description: +3 Pilot & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), always avoid collisions w/allies

name: Unleashed
description: spend Destiny Point to access Unleashed abilities

name: Unstoppable Combatant
description: can catch more than one Second Wind per encounter

name: Unstoppable Force
description: +5 Fort Def & Will Def v. Use the Force

name: Unswerving Resolve
description:
if targeted by fear or mind-affecting effect that fails, gain FP to be spent before next turn as long as you did not
negate

name: Unwavering Focus
description: when mind-affecting effect is against your Will Def, you impose -2

name: Unwavering Resolve
description: +5 Will Def v. Deception & Persuasion

name: Vehicle Systems Expertise
description: Recharge Shields/Reroute Power as 2swif, 1/encounter DC30 Mechanics 1 swif

name: Vehicular Combat
description: negate one attack a round against a vehicle, Pilot v. Atk roll

name: Vehicular Surge
description: 1/day as swif bonus hp = 1/4 max hp of Colossal or smaller vehicle

name: Veteran Spacer
description: +5 Use Computer to perform astrogation

name: Vitality Surge
description: can catch Second Wind even if not below half hit points

name: Warrior Heritage
description: +2 Will Def when you wield atlatl or cesta

name: Wary Defender
description: +2 Fort Def & Will Def if fight defensively

name: Wary Sentries (team feat)
description: +3 Perception & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), can take 10

name: Weapon Finesse
description: Use Dex mod instead of Str mod on Atk with light melee weapons

name: Weapon Finesse + Weapon Focus
description: a single one-handed weapon with Focus is light for Weapon Finesse

name: Weapon Focus
description: +1 Atk on selected weapon

name: Weapon Focus + Weapon Finesse
description: a single one-handed weapon with Focus is light for Weapon Finesse

name: Weapon Proficiency
description: no -5 penalty on Atk

name:
Weapon Proficiency  (lightsabers)
+ QD
description: draw and ignite lightsaber as single swif action

name: Whirlwind Attack
description: melee Atk against each target within reach, make one roll

name: Wicked Strike
description: with Rapid Strike make a 2nd atk at -2 w/in reach, deal half dam

name: Wilderness First Aid
description: 1/day DC20 Survival & considered to have medpacs until end of day

name: Wilderness Specialists (team feat)
description: +3 Survival & +1 each ally w/feat w/in 12 sq (max +7), aid another provides +4

name: Withdrawal Strike
description: opponents may not withdraw, they may Tumble as normal

name: Wookiee Grip
description: Wield a two-handed weapon one-handed at -2 atk

name: Wroshyr Rage
description: when you first enter a rage, gain hp = 10 + 1/2 level

name: Wrruushi Training
description:
1/rnd w/successful unarmed atk gain hp = Con mod, 1/enc atk Fort Def & if successful enemy takes dam &
loses any equipment Fort Def for enc, w/Expertise 1/enc w/crit deal dam & move -2 down track, must be
wearing light or no armor

name: Zero Range
description: +1 on ranged Atk and +1 die damage against adjacent foes
